description: The OR_IMP_2 table contains implant information specific to Mechanical Circulatory System and Implantable Cardioverter Defibrillator devices.

columns.name: IMPLANT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the implant record.

columns.name: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN
columns.description:
Specifies whether this is the patient's primary device.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: DEVICE_EXPLANT_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID for the reason a device was explanted.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Transplant


Device Malfunction - Elective


Device Malfunction - Emergent


Device Thrombosis - Elective


Device Thrombosis - Emergent


Infection - Emergent


Infection - Elective


Ventricular Recovery - Device Removed


Ventricular Recovery - Device Not Removed, Turned Off

columns.name: CONSOLE_TRACKING_NUM
columns.description: The mechanical circulatory system device console tracking number.

columns.name: CANNULAE_LOC_INFLOW_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID for a device's cannulae inflow location.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


LA Appendage


LA Interatrial Groove


LA Apex


RA


RV


Unknown

columns.name: CANNULAE_LOC_OUTFLOW_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID for a device's cannulae outflow location.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Abdominal Aorta


Ascending Aorta


Descending Aorta


Pulmonary Artery


Unknown

columns.name: DEVICE_STUDY_NUM
columns.description: The device research study number.

columns.name: DEVICE_STRAT_TIME_IMP_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID for the intended treatment of an implanted mechanical circulatory device.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Bridge to Recovery


Rescue Therapy


Bridge to Transplant (Currently Listed)


Possible Bridge to Transplant - Likely Eligible


Possible Bridge to Transplant - Moderate Likelihood


Possible Bridge to Transplant - Unlikely Eligible


Destination Therapy - Modifiable


Destination Therapy - Unmodifiable


Unknown


Other

columns.name: DEVICE_STRAT_TIME_IMP_FREETEXT
columns.description: The intended treatment for an implanted mechanical circulatory device. This is a free-text field for describing values not found in Device Strategy At Time of Implant (I IMP 16507).

columns.name: ICD_CS_LV_SUCCESS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates if the coronary sinus/left ventricular (CS/LV) lead was successfully implanted. This item corresponds to ICD Sequence 6145.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


Not Implanted


Previously Implanted

columns.name: ICD_CSLV_NT_IMP_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates the reason a Coronary Sinus Access or Left Ventricular (CS/LV) lead was not implanted. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Vascular access


Coronary sinus access


Tributary vein access


Coronary sinus dissection


Unacceptable threshold


Diaphragmatic stimulation

columns.name: ICD_LET_SUCCESSFUL
columns.description: Indicates the lowest energy tested (LET) or defibrillation threshold that demonstrated that the device performs successfully (in joules).

columns.name: ICD_LET_NOT_TSTD_YN
columns.description:
Indicates the lowest energy tested (LET) that was successful was not tested.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: ICD_ULV
columns.description: Indicates the upper limit of vulnerability (ULV) in joules.

columns.name: ICD_ULV_NOT_TEST_YN
columns.description:
Indicates the upper limit of vulnerability (ULV) was not tested. 


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: ICD_REIMP_ENDBAT_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if a reason for reimplant is the end of expected battery life of a previous ICD.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: ICD_REIMP_LEADRVN_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if a reason for reimplant is that the generator is being replaced at the time of lead revision.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: ICD_REIMP_UPGRADE_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if a reason for reimplant is an upgrade of a previous device with additional pacing capabilities such as an upgrade from a single to a dual chamber device, or the replacement of a non-CRT with a CRT device.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: ICD_REIMP_INFECTN_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if a reason for reimplant is due to infection in the location of the previously implanted device. 


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: ICD_REIMP_MNRCALL_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if a reason for reimplant is that the previous device has been recognized by the manufacturer as demonstrating a recurring performance failure resulting in an advisory letter to physicians. This may or may not reach the level of a food and drug administration (FDA) designated recall. This also may or may not have led to device malfunction. 


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: ICD_REIMP_FLTYHDR_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if a reason for reimplant is that there was a faulty connector/header which required Coding Instructions: another implant. 


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: ICD_REIMP_DVRELOC_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if a reason for reimplant is that the device needed to be relocated because of a medical condition, or procedure near the original pocket. An example is if the patient was diagnosed with breast cancer and required treatment or surgery near the original implant. 


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: ICD_REIMP_MALFUNC_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if a reason for reimplant is that the previous generator has malfunctioned. The device performance is outside the manufacturer's designated specification and cannot be resolved with reprogramming, necessitating in the replacement of the device, in the opinion of the physician. 


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: ICD_MLFN_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates the reason for malfunction of the ICD implant.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Atrial pacing


Left ventricular (LV) pacing


Right ventricular (RV) pacing


Defibrillation


Premature battery depletion

columns.name: ICD_ATPSHCK_DLVRD_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if, at any point in time, the ICD being removed had delivered antitachycardia pacing (ATP) or shock therapy. 


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: ICD_ATPSHCK_APPRO_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if, at any point in time, the Implantable Cardioverter Defibrillator (ICD) being removed had delivered appropriate antitachycardia pacing (ATP) or shock therapy for spontaneous ventricular tachycardia and/or ventricular fibrillation.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: ICD_ATP_SUCCESSFL_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the antitachycardia pacing (ATP) therapy for ventricular tachycardia and/or ventricular fibrillation was successful.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: ICD_SHCK_SUCCESS_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the shock therapy for ventricular tachycardia and/or ventricular fibrillation was successful. 


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: ICD_LD_PLCMNT_ISS_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the existing lead had any placement issues.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: ICD_LD_PERF_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if there was penetration of the existing lead through a systemic vein, coronary vein, or the myocardium. 


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: ICD_PT_CLIN_STATS_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if a non-lead related medical or surgical procedure required the existing lead to be replaced.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: ICD_LD_DISLDGEMNT_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if there was movement (macroscopic or microscopic) of an existing lead within the heart or vascular tree away from the original implantation site. 


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: ICD_LEAD_INFCTION_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if there was a suspected or documented infection of the existing lead.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: ICD_EROSION_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if there was erosion of the existing lead.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: ICD_FAULTY_CONNCT_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if there was a faulty connector/header in the existing lead. 


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: ICD_DOC_INFECTION_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if there was a documented infection of the existing lead as evidenced by positive microbiological cultures/smears or other microbiological evidence indicating infection. 


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: ICD_PACING_ISSUE_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if there were pacing issues such as oversensing, undersensing, failure to pace, failure to capture with acceptable safety margin, or extracardiac stimulation. 


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: ICD_OVERSENSE_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the existing lead was functioning abnormally due to oversensing. Oversensing manifests as sensing of electrical signals not related to cardiac depolarization of the lead chamber that cannot be resolved acceptably by device reprogramming. 


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: ICD_UNDERSENSE_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the existing lead was functioning abnormally due to undersensing. Undersensing manifests as failure to sense appropriate cardiac depolarizations that cannot be resolved with reprogramming. 


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: ICD_FAIL_TO_PACE_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the existing lead was functioning abnormally because there was failure to pace. Failure to pace manifests as absence of pacemaker stimulation artifacts on electrocardiographic recordings despite rates below pacemaker programmed rate. 


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: ICD_FAIL_SF_MRGN_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the existing lead was functioning abnormally because there was failure to capture with acceptable safety margins. This manifests as a high pacing threshold that results in either intermittent failure to capture at maximal programmed output or excessive batter drain leading to premature battery exhaustion. 


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: ICD_XTRACARD_STIM_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the existing lead was functioning abnormally because there was extracardiac stimulation. This manifests as stimulation by the lead of non-cardiac structures such as the diaphragm, chest wall, or pectoral muscle. 


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: ICD_DEFIB_ISSUES_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the existing lead had defibrillation issues such as oversensing with or without shock/ATP, or failed shocks/inadequate Defibrillation Threshold (DFT) safety margins.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: ICD_DFIB_OVRSNS_W_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the existing lead had defibrillation problems due to oversensing with shock/antitachycardia pacing (ATP). This manifests as sensing of non-cardiac depolarization signals that met arrhythmia detection criteria and elicited programmed tachyarrhythmia therapy. 


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: ICD_DFB_OVRSNS_WO_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the existing lead had defibrillation issues due to oversensing without shock/antitachycardia pacing (ATP). This manifests as sensing of non-cardiac depolarization signals that did not meet arrhythmia detection criteria and do not elicit programmed tachyarrhythmia therapy. 


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: ICD_DFB_FAIL_SHCK_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the existing lead had defibrillation issues due to failed shocks or inadequate defibrillation threshold safety margins. 


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: ICD_LD_INTG_ISSUE_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the existing lead had abnormal function due to lead integrity issues.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: ICD_LD_CNDCT_FAIL_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the existing lead had abnormal function due to a lead integrity issue of conductor failure. Conductor failure manifests by high lead impedance either absolutely (above manufacturer's product specifications) or by a significant increase from previously stable chronic values. 


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: ICD_LD_INSUL_FAIL_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the existing lead had abnormal function due to a lead integrity issue of insulation failure. Insulation failure manifests as low lead impedance either absolutely (below manufacture's product specifications) or by a significant decrease from previously stable chronic values.  


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: IMPLANTATION_TEMP_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the tissue temperature at implantation.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: STORAGE_TEMP_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the tissue storage temperature.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: IMPLANT_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the class of the implant.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: PATIENT_REQUESTED_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores if the implant was requested by the patient.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: IMPLANT_FIN_COMMENT
columns.description: Stores the comment for the implant.

columns.name: CLINICAL_IND_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the clinical indication for the requested implant.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


None

columns.name: GUDID_REQUEST_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the status of a request to the FDA's GUDID for information on this implant.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Successful


Request failed - retrying


Preparing to send request


Waiting for response


Request failed - device not in GUDID

columns.name: GUDID_BRAND_NAME
columns.description: This column stores the brand name obtained from Global Unique Device Identification Database (GUDID) for an implant.

columns.name: GUDID_VERSION_NUM
columns.description: This column stores the version or model number obtained from GUDID for an implant.

columns.name: GUDID_COMPANY_NAME
columns.description: This column stores the company name obtained from GUDID for an implant.

columns.name: GUDID_CONTAINS_LATEX_RUBBER
columns.description: This column stores whether or not an implant is labeled as containing natural rubber latex or dry natural rubber according to GUDID. GUDID returns either a "true" or a "false" for this item. However, this is not a YN column as we want to be able to handle any new values that might be added for this field.

columns.name: GUDID_IMPLANT_DESCRIPTION
columns.description: This column stores the implant Global Medical Device Nomenclature (GMDN) Preferred Term name obtained from GUDID for an implant.

columns.name: TISSUE_IDNT_CODE
columns.description: This column stores the Distinct Identification Code for tissue implants.

columns.name: TISSUE_DIC_FLAGS
columns.description: This column stores flag characters associated with the distinct identification code of a tissue implant.

columns.name: CONTAINER_LOT_NUMBER
columns.description: This stores the container lot number for implants.

columns.name: CONTAINER_EXP_DATE
columns.description: This stores the container expiration date for implants.

columns.name: TISSUE_PLACED_IN_STORAGE_DTTM
columns.description: This stores the instant the tissue was placed in storage.

columns.name: TISSUE_PLACED_IN_STORAGE_ID
columns.description: This stores the user that placed the tissue in storage.

columns.name: TISSUE_DONATION_VERIFIED_ID
columns.description: This stores the user that verified the tissue donation.

columns.name: TISSUE_CULTURE_COLLECTED_BY_ID
columns.description: This stores the user that collected the tissue culture.

columns.name: TISSUE_CULTURE_SENT_BY_ID
columns.description: This stores the user that sent the tissue culture.

columns.name: TISSUE_REMOVED_FROM_STORAGE_ID
columns.description: The provider ID for the person who removed the tissue from storage.

columns.name: TISSUE_REC_STORAGE_TEMPERATURE
columns.description: This stores information regarding the recommended storage temperature.

columns.name: IMPLANT_APPROACH_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID for the approach taken for the implant/joint.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: FEMUR_MANUFACTURER_C_NAME
columns.description:
The femur manufacturer category ID for the implant.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: TIBIA_MANUFACTURER_C_NAME
columns.description:
The tibia manufacturer category ID for the implant.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: FEMUR_MANUFACTURER_C_NAME

columns.name: PREV_FEMUR_MANUFACTURER_C_NAME
columns.description:
The old femur prosthesis manufacturer category ID for the implant.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: FEMUR_MANUFACTURER_C_NAME

columns.name: PREV_TIBIA_MANUFACTURER_C_NAME
columns.description:
The old tibia prosthesis manufacturer category ID for the implant.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: FEMUR_MANUFACTURER_C_NAME

columns.name: CEMENT_USED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether cement was used for this implant. Y indicates cement was used. N indicates cement was not used. Null indicates cement usage was not assessed or is not applicable for this type of implant.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: CEMENT_USED_FEMUR_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether cement was used on the femur for this implant. Y indicates cement was used on the femur. N indicates cement was not used on the femur. Null indicates cement usage was not assessed or is not applicable for this type of implant.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: CEMENT_USED_ACETABULUM_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether cement was used on the acetabulum for this implant. Y indicates cement was used on the acetabulum. N indicates cement was not used on the acetabulum. Null indicates cement usage was not assessed or is not applicable for this type of implant.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: CEMENT_USED_TIBIA_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether cement was used on the tibia for this implant. Y indicates cement was used on the tibia. N indicates cement was not used on the tibia. Null indicates cement usage was not assessed or is not applicable for this type of implant.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: CEMENT_USED_PATELLA_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether cement was used on the patella for this implant. Y indicates cement was used on the patella. N indicates cement was not used on the patella. Null indicates cement usage was not assessed or is not applicable for this type of implant.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: CEMENT_USED_OTHER_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether cement was used on another prosthesis for this implant. Y indicates cement was used on another prosthesis. N indicates cement was not used on another prosthesis. Null indicates cement usage was not assessed or is not applicable for this type of implant.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DEVICE_YN

columns.name: CEMENT_TECHNIQUE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The cement application technique category ID for the implant.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: CEMENT_MIX_C_NAME
columns.description:
The cement mix category ID for the implant.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: CEMENT_MANUFACTURER_C_NAME
columns.description:
The cement manufacturer category ID for the implant.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: FEMUR_MANUFACTURER_C_NAME

columns.name: BONE_GRAFT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The bone graft type category ID for the implant.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: DEGEN_GLENOHUMERAL_C_NAME
columns.description:
The glenohumeral joint degeneration category ID for the implant. This describes the type of degeneration exhibited by the joint.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: AP_CONGRUENCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The anteroposterior congruence category ID for the implant. This describes the congruence of the joint in the anteroposterior direction.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: CENTRIC_JOINT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The centric joint type category ID for the implant.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: POST_ECCENTRIC_CAPUT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The posteriorly eccentric caput category ID for the implant.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: ANT_ECCENTRIC_CAPUT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The anteriorly eccentric caput category ID for the implant.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: CRANIO_CONGRUENCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The craniocaudal congruence category ID for the implant. This describes the congruence of the joint in the craniocaudal direction.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: SUP_ECCENTRIC_CAPUT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The superiorly eccentric caput category ID for the implant.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: JOINT_CONGRUENCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The joint congruence category ID for the implant.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: GLENOID_COMPONENT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The glenoid component category ID for the implant.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: HUMERAL_COMPONENT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The humeral component category ID for the implant.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined
